Preterite.turoyo: kǝtli kefe bu šuro du bayto kulle fayixi (раскрошились crumble; p.c. Isḥaq) All stones which in the wall of the house, were crumbled.(Ilyas p.c)

azzan lu ḥsoḏo da tlawḥe, ḥǝngi (ġalabe) našifiwa, fayixi kulle b iḏayna (раскрошились crumble; p.c. Isḥaq) I went to sowing of lentils, they used to dry very much, all of them crumbled in our hand.(Ilyas p.c)

Infectum.turoyo: Maḥtənne, maḥti maye aʕlayye, maḥtənne bayn am maye. Kfayxi, kfǝrdi (2018_07_01_01.2_Arkah_Ishaq_old_houses_ED: 017) (The burnt limestone crumbles in the water)

Preterite.turoyo: Hawxa u=kalšo saymiwayle bu=šəklawo, kŭl=d-əbʕiwa naqqa gmaydiwanne, tloṯ, arbaʕ kefe, ḥamməš kefe m-anək, gbayziwa maye aʕlayye, gmafixiwanne w gxulṭiwa nqurto appe
translations: . Like so, the lime, they made it this way, whenever they needed, immediately (or: “at the moment”) they took it, three-four stones, five stones of the kind, they poured water upon them, they dissolved them and mixed mortar in them (in the stones)2019_13_01_Malfono_Ishaq;67

Preterite.turoyo: Azzən aǧ ǧulayḏan w dəṯṯe lu uti. Uti rabo du bəxur. Yaʕni bu dəxono. Mḥalqənne, mgaʕgəsi, šaʕiṯi flan. Mayiṯi aq qalmanək, kulle azzən
translations: 'Our and their clothes went to ironing. A big steam iron. With steam. They were thrown, became (?) intertwined and yellow. These lice died, they all perished'
